in no hurry to make presidential decision Mike Pence Will Not Run for President Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. the entire ordeal, Michael Vick agreed to a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a company that produces protective padding for athletes. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, Michael Vick said.
